title: How many upvotes can we get on a nerf shyvanna thread
body:
This champ, needs to be fixed, and preferably quickly, this is ruining games, and appears to be mostly unbalanced, plz balance damage/tank more appropriately, too tank too dmg too maneuvurable basically unfair for 90% of players, and anyone whose disagreeing is simply disagreeing for the sake of freelo. We dont like this....is too op...rito plz fix
ty, 
ur fellow gamer
